articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: ‘Captain America’ protester convicted under Hong Kong national security law - INQUIRER.net
articles.description: HONG KONG — A Hong Kong activist dubbed "Captain America 2.0" for wielding the superhero's shield during protests was found guilty of incitement to secession on Monday, the second
articles.content: Pedestrians walk past a painted wall with mesh wires outside Mong Kok Police Station in Hong Kong, China, April 27, 2021. Mong Kok was a popular protest area for democracy activists in 2019. REUTERS/… [+2601 chars]
